title: 4Videosoft DVD Creator 6.2.8 Multilingual + Patch
description:
4Videosoft DVD Creator 6.2.8 Multilingual + Patch

4Videosoft DVD creator is the professional DVD Creator, which provides the best solution to convert any video format like MP4, MOV, AVI, WMV, 3GP, MKV, MTS, etc. to DVD disc, DVD folder and ISO file for sharing with your family or friends on your DVD player.

and burn online/local videos
4Videosoft DVD Creator enables you to online videos from popular video-sharing sites, like YouTube,Dailymotion, Vevo, Vimeo and so on. And you could also use the DVD Creator to make your favorite ed videos or local video from your computer into various DVD formats (DVD-R, DVD+R, DVD-RW, DVD+RW, DVD+R DL, DVD-R DL, DVD-5 and DVD-9).
Edit Personalized Video
For the better effect, you can optimize the video by editing the video effects before burning DVD file. The DVD Creator allows you to trim the video length, crop the video frame freely, rotate video in 90 clockwise or counterclockwise, flip video vertically or horizontally, adjust the video brightness, contrast and saturation, enable 2D video into 3D video, add watermark to the video in form of text or image and specify the position and transparency of the watermark. Powerfully, it also enables you to add filtering effects to video. Various effects can be chosen from, like blur, sharpen, grey, sketch and so on.
Create Special DVD Menu
Various beautiful menu templates are provided for you to choose. You can even more DVD Menu Templates here. You can add background picture/music, and opening film into the DVD. Still there are different frames and button styles for you to customize the DVD menu. Moreover, this software can help you edit the menu text contents like font, color and size for your preference. For your customized menu templates, you could save them for next use.
Add preferred audio track and subtitle freely
With the DVD Creator, you can attach personalized audio track and subtitle to satisfy your need. You can add subtitle on SSA, SRT, ASS, VTT, UTF, SMI, TXT, etc. and define the font, size, color, transparency, delay and position of the subtitle freely. For the audio tack, you could import WMA, AAC, AIFF, MP3, OGG, etc. and the multi-audio tack is allowed. Then you could adjust the audio volume and delay settings to create the DVD audio track.
Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8/8.1, 10
